message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this exceptional product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe this reflects its true worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're trying to get a good price for the product, but $1,150,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $1,050,000. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
